_header: Circumstantly three kings came by night
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 314; Ringler Jr. (1988)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse Printed 1476-1558. London: Mansell, 1988, TP 310.
_description: Mnemonic verses on the saints’ days in each month, adapted from the French — twelve quatrains

HunPB82241.First Lines:
Ianuerye hath xxii dayes[Circum]stantly thre kynges came by
                    nyghtBy an hye[…] mye lyght…
HunPB82241.Last Lines:
…Oswald forthe with saynt VictorWith George and Marke to do so
                    no moreMaye hathe xxxi. dayes
HunPB82241.Note: Ends incompletely; visible only under ultra-violet.

         67 (1992): 595-623: 615.
